examples.comment_2: Create a {{TextWatermarker}} instance using the path to {{FileFormatUp}}
examples.comment_3: Use search settings to find watermarks

content.title: **[{{ProdShortName}}]({{ProductUrl}})** makes it easy to detect watermarks in different types of business documents. Add this tool to your {{ProgLang}} project to enable watermark detection features.
content.step_1: To begin, initialize the {{TextWatermarkerBold}} class and load your {{FileformatCap}} document using a file path, file stream, or byte array. This prepares the file for watermark search.
content.step_2: To narrow your search, use the {{TextSearchCriteriaBold}} class. For image watermarks, provide a sample image. For text, set details like font, size, color, or other related attributes.
content.step_3: Call the {{TextSearchBold}} method from the {{TextWatermarkerBold}} instance to start the search. It returns a list of found watermark items for you to work with.
content.step_4: With the list of watermark items, you can remove or edit them as needed. For example, you might want to update their size or text.

more_features.title: Advanced Watermark Detection in {{ProgLang}} with {{ProdShortName}}
more_features.description: Explore powerful watermark search options in the {{ProdShortName}} API, designed for use in {{ProgLang}} projects.

feature_1.title: Simple and Fast Watermark Detection
feature_1.content: Use {{ProdShortName}} to quickly find watermarks in your {{ProgLang}} code. The smart search engine helps you locate watermarks with ease.

feature_2.title: Find Specific Watermarks with Accuracy
feature_2.content: Protect your files by finding watermarks based on color, size, or location. {{ProdShortName}} makes it easy to configure search filters in {{ProgLang}}.

feature_3.title: {{ProgLang}} Tools for Full Watermark Control
feature_3.content: Add {{ProdShortName}} to your {{ProgLang}} apps to search, inspect, and track watermark usage. Great for audits, branding, or content protection.

code_1.title: {{ProgLang}} Sample: Full Watermark Detection Flow
code_1.content: See how to use {{ProdShortName}} in {{ProgLang}} to search through documents, handle multiple formats, and use complex filters.
code_1.comment_1: Set up your {{ProgLang}} app and load the document
code_1.comment_2: Define what kind of watermark to look for
code_1.comment_3: Run the search and gather watermark data
code_1.comment_4: Use the found info for further steps like removal or review
